AD_BanditsDiscussion.synopsis: Discussion between Gimbleboc and Taman before the scene against them triggers. They're arguing about whether to investigate the crash (this segues into the beginning of their intertactive dialogue when you get near enough)

nodes.speaker: Gimblebock
nodes.text: You'll die a bloody pauper unless you take a few risks.

nodes.speaker: Taman
nodes.text: Why don't we just wait a while? Make sure it's safe.

EntranceDoor.synopsis:
This is the same character as Andorn, the bandit guard within the chapel.

This character is talking to the players through a door - he's locked the door and is on the other side, so they'll be talking TO the door and can't see him.

The player is talking to a gullible bandit through a door - the bandit is inside a chapel dungeon and his friends are outside. The player has probably either killed them or scared them away at this point. The guard is not very bright...

nodes.speaker: GROUP_Act1_CHA_FL1_BanditGuard
nodes.text: That you, Gimblebock? Everything all right out there?
nodes.context: NodeContext: Speaking to players through a locked door. He's reacting to them trying to open it and thinks they're his accomplice, a gnome called Gimblebock (ɡɪmbəl-bock)

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Gimblebock triggered some trap. He needs help - now!

nodes.speaker: GROUP_Act1_CHA_FL1_BanditGuard
nodes.text: Yeah? And who are you? Probably your trap that did him in...
nodes.context: NodeContext: Speaking to players through a locked door. Player just tried to convince him his boss - a bandit leader - was injured by a trap. He's calling us out on the lie

nodes.speaker: GROUP_Act1_CHA_FL1_BanditGuard
nodes.text: Come through that door, and you're getting a knife in the guts.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Speaking to players through a locked door. he's threatening the player, who just tried to convince him his boss - a bandit leader - was harmed by a trap. He's bluffing a little bit and is more worried than he's letting on

VB_LockpickingShadowheart_1_WithShadowhe.synopsis: Shadowheart lockpicked the crypt door that she usually try to bash.

nodes.speaker: Shadowheart
nodes.text: There! Not so impregnable after all.
nodes.context: NodeContext: Satisfied. She's just successfully lockpicked a large, heavy set of doors.

VB_BanditsLeaveReaction.synopsis: The player comments on how they talked the bandits into leaving (or companions react to the player's successful persuasion).

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Lucky those bandits valued their own hides over their loot.

AD_Bandit_Melee_02_CrushedReaction.synopsis: A bandit sees the corpse of one of his companions, killed by a falling boulder

nodes.speaker: Taman
nodes.text: We'd have been safer in the crypt!
nodes.context: NodeContext: reacting with shock on seeing a dead friend

AD_BanditReaction.synopsis: A bandit exclaims in alarm/indignity upon spotting the player 'trespassing' near a tomb they intended to loot.
